app.title: Scriptless
app.subtitle: Transcribe audio completely offline
app.footer: The transcription is performed locally on your device. Your data remains private.
app.footer_credits: Created by <authorLink1>Ollie Black</authorLink1> and <authorLink2>Jon Martin</authorLink2> based on work by <basedOnLink>Pierre Mesure</basedOnLink>

manager.from_url_description: Enter the URL of the audio file you want to load.
manager.info_content:
Scriptless is a small website to help you transcribe audio speech into text. 

Before you upload a file, it will download an AI model that can perform the transcription locally in your browser. 

This means that your audio file never leaves your device. It also means that the transcription will be slow or fail if your computer/smartphone is not powerful enough to perform it.

In the settings (bottom right corner), you can pick among different models and various quantisation levels. A smaller model with a lower quantisation will be faster but make more mistakes. By default, Scriptless uses small models but you can try a bigger one and see if it works on your device.

For most languages, it is best to use <4>OpenAI's official models</4> (Multilingual).
